text: Ōshima (Japanese: 大島, 大嶋) is a Japanese surname. It means "big island". Notable people with this name are listed below. * Naoto Ōshima - video game designer * Nagisa Oshima - movie director and screenwriter * Tadamori Oshima - politician ==Footballers== * Hideo Oshima * Ryota Oshima * Yasuaki Oshima * Takahiro Oshima * Tsubasa Oshima Category:Japanese-language surnames
title: Ōshima (surname)
